message: I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product at a special price. I think you'll really love it!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I'm interested in the product but $12,000 is a bit high for my budget. Would you consider a lower price?
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but I have to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we discuss a price of $10,000?
